gpu_get_cullmode: This function can be used to retrieve the backface culling mode. The returned value will be one of the following constants (the default value is <tt>cull_noculling</tt>):
All clockwise triangles will be culled
All counter-clockwise triangles will be culled
The above code gets the current cull mode and if it is not <tt>cull_clockwise</tt> it is set to that constant.
